feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.3.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Fix teams helper image background color mode by @Souptik2001 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15918
  • chore: Add missing comments for self hosted billing by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15923
  • chore: Update feature_request.md by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15926
  • style: update text area by @RNAdvani in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15934
  • fix: #15697 Assignment warning modal poping up ,even when hosts are added . by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15699
  • fix: getting an error when a team member tries to leave a team by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15925
  • feat: add transitions to more components by @hichemfantar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15916
  • fix: Change minimum number of teams required for org self-serve by @Souptik2001 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15955
  • feat: pwa ready and add shortcut for quick access by @hichemfantar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15957
  • fix: update translations for "by proceeding, ..." by @jomaendle2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15921
  • feat: Add title attribute to iframe in embed.ts by @hichemfantar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15944
  • fix: Assignment reminder modal appears when deleting a team event type by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15544
  • fix: Add CORP and COEP headers to embedded pages by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15275
  • feat: No-show bookings - do not count towards a member's round robin assignment by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15323
  • refactor: v1 orgs unlimited teams by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15908
  • fix: refresh connect atoms on token change by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15933
  • fix: Next.js bundle analysis by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15903
  • fix: type in webhook payload by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15912
  • fix: auto accept by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15975
  • fix: Broken GitHub workflows by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15979
  • test: Delete credential endpoint by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15322
  • fix: #15967 Show better error when wrong variable is used in custom event name by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15974
  • chore: add global rate limiting to prevent abuse apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15971
  • feat: ability to provide a reason for event rejection (from email) and some changes by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15098
  • fix: bullMq redis connection string apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15970
  • fix: #15968 update to show booking question variables in Available variables by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15981
  • feat: cal ai templates by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15391
  • fix: Add signup disabled flag check on signup route by @Souptik2001 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15844
  • fix: Add strict checks for email to create an organization by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15976
  • feat: min max chars for long text by @varshith257 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15691
  • chore: fixed a few destructive buttons by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15990
  • fix: added translations for connect atoms by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15969
  • feat: platform team event-types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15928
  • refactor: platform org event types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15961
  • fix: #15989 disable country prefill in phone input by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15991
  • chore: add doc + test reschedule booking api v1 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15907
  • fix: alert message is not positioned properly by @ymohit1603 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15995
  • feat: add row click to open slideover by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15998
  • fix: issues with verified emails in workflow by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15965
  • test: add tests for components/editor by @ImBIOS in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15938
  • fix: Reschedule URL for an org migrated/moved user's booking. by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15736
  • fix: incorrect variable by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16002
  • fix: meeting link is not updated and broken ui in edit location dialog by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15503
  • revert: "fix: meeting link is not updated and broken ui in edit location dialog" by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16011
  • chore: v4.3.4 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16010

New Contributors

  • @RNAdvani made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15934
  • @jomaendle2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15921
  • @varshith257 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15691
  • @ymohit1603 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15995
  • @ImBIOS made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15938

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.3.3...v4.3.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.3.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: bulk update event type dialog logic by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16014
  • chore: disconnect prisma on module destroy apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16018
  • fix: don't wait for telemetry for booking critical path by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16039
  • chore: add gap to orgs user data table filters by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16000
  • feat: SysAdmin API Guard for Org Admins by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15867
  • feat: api v2 webhooks for users and event-types by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15996
  • fix: Future Limit Calculations by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15825
  • fix: hide org upgrade banner for platform orgs by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16031
  • fix: typo in license service + move to a noop by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16029
  • fix: platform orgs shouldn't have org redirect by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16032
  • feat: Add URL-type input in booking question field by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15481
  • feat: Make event duration a dynamic text variable by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15262
  • feat: Default to showing the next month with availability by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15292
  • refactor: event types infinite scroll by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15949
  • chore: upgrades playwright to 1.45.3 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16034
  • perf: improve typescript perf by pre-generating the router types by @dlvhdr in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15929
  • feat: new design of users slideover by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16048
  • fix: testId -> testid by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16081
  • fix: re-booked booking metadata by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16074
  • fix: Prefill of Attendee Phone Number location with a + in URL by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16086
  • fix: next.js console warning due to output:standalone by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16087
  • chore: Reapply "fix: bookings made via API don't include the specified locat… by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15461
  • feat: Round robin reassignment via round robin algorithm [CAL-3138] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14308
  • chore: Refactor CloseComSetup form submission logic by @ImBIOS in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16062
  • fix: #15857 add managed by tooltip by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15861
  • fix: incorrect week-start input value by @ymohit1603 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16057
  • chore: update null noShowHost in Booking to false by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15891
  • fix: #16041 team eventtype create from api by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16058
  • fix: type error that is visible now by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16090
  • chore: add a timeout of 2s to the licence key service by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16027
  • chore: replaced discord with github discussions by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16092
  • test: Create 5 tests cases for POST /api/event-types endpoint by @Stain19 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16082
  • fix: Wrong tracking event for bookings by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16094
  • chore: Fix typo in CSS class name for signup page and Calendar by @ImBIOS in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16059
  • fix: issue in the event location field by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15229
  • chore: nestjs readme by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16049
  • fix: Set user's timezone as fallback to event's timezone by @Souptik2001 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16065
  • fix: remove row on click for data-table by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16098
  • chore: v4.3.5 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16096

New Contributors

  • @dlvhdr made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15929
  • @Stain19 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16082

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.3.4...v4.3.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.3.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Remove missing users from assignment by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16115
  • fix: use organization default fixedPrice if self-serve/default price is passed in by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15966
  • fix: display skeleton loader by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16114
  • feat: create new markNoShow endpoint by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15738
  • chore: Remove cal.ai email assistant by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16003
  • fix: uncaught errors in PaymentService by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16104
  • feat: Add upcoming bookings feature to GET /api/bookings endpoint by @ImBIOS in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16060
  • fix: Hide personal booking theme when in an organization by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16117
  • fix: SCIM improvements by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16103
  • fix: Unable to submit booking form if Attendee Phone is used and then booking Fields are saved by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15742
  • fix: Better UI for the setup page, When trying to reach an app that hasn't been already installed under an account by @Mihir867 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16121
  • feat: Allow cancellation & reschedule on past bookings by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16118
  • chore: oAuth Client Guard apv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16130
  • fix: use singleton in license key service by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16131
  • chore: Release v4.3.6 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16136

New Contributors

  • @Mihir867 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16121

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.3.5...v4.3.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: v2 event-types & MS outlook event description by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16132
  • fix: uncaught PaymentService typings in payment utils by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16107
  • perf: use svg sprite for icons by @G3root in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16135
  • fix: #15474 retrieve zoom usersettings and update zoom integration by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15489
  • fix: #15726 increase max recurring events limit input by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15728
  • feat: atoms date overrides modal custom classes by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16147
  • fix: broken password inputs by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16148
  • refactor: simplify workflow page and improve load time by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16095
  • test: v2 new event-types endpoints handle legacy event-types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16144
  • fix: remove requirement for signature token by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16151
  • revert: fix: #15857 add managed by tooltip by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16139
  • feat: App horizon workrooms by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16152
  • feat: Platform OAuthClient Webhooks by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16134
  • fix: add sensible default size for svg icons by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16159
  • fix: reviewed-user-sms-lock by @TaduJR in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16016
  • feat: improve Card component hover effect by @hichemfantar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16161
  • feat: provide option to allow rescheduling with the same round-robin host by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15132
  • chore: fixed todesktop nav by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16170
  • fix: remove layout as its already in /future/settings/teams/layout.tsx by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16172
  • fix: Add booking related events for recurring bookings as well by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16180
  • test: Add E2E tests for orgRedirection=true param by @ImBIOS in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16066
  • test: Bring back broken out-of-office tests, prevent modal button clickable before flicker, and fix timezone issue by @ImBIOS in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16001
  • fix: Replace empty user name with user email by @shreya0204 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16176
  • fix: scheduleId not unset properly bug by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15993
  • feat: CalendarSettings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16120
  • feat: e2e reports in gh-pages by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16179
  • feat: add gtm to load in us only by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16146
  • fix: Disable all emails per event type w/o a workflow [CAL-4066] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15902
  • feat: Assign colors to events by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15298
  • fix: doesn't fall back to calvideo if wrong destination is used for google meet by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16195
  • fix: transcribe UI subtitle were blocking chat by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16097
  • fix: ready-for-e2e label by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16100
  • test: merge all e2e reports by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16202
  • fix: missing pipeline dependecies by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16205
  • chore: preserve non-org dashboard for platform users by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16181
  • fix: platform me data for dashboard by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16210
  • fix: use platform me typing by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16214
  • feat: Round Robin Weights by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15558
  • refactor: use WebhookService in payments router by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16108
  • feat: destination calendar settings for CalendarSettings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16133
  • fix: pipeline permissions for label action by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16220
  • feat: attributes by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15964
  • chore: Release v4.4.0 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16219

New Contributors

  • @shreya0204 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16176

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.3.6...v4.4.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Outlook Event Formatting by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16217
  • feat: extend api/v2/event-types by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16128
  • fix: padding around adding fixed host by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16227
  • fix: Duplicating org team event types not working #16199 by @Flash-Shivam in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16204
  • fix: check profiles from user.profiles apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16235
  • fix: rewrite to avoid cross origin issues with sprite.svg icons by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16239
  • fix: cross domain SVG sprites by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16244
  • chore: v4.4.1 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16246

New Contributors

  • @Flash-Shivam made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16204

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.4.0...v4.4.1
